attributes.action: ask mr. brown to resign as he is a non-elected leader whos party keep interfering in our lives without tackling crime, the nhs, educations, immigration
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: this disgusting non elected leaders regime is talking about banning xmas, not eating pork, there has been a smoking ban etc. we are all aware of the increasing levels of the nanny state. sort out the dirty hospitals, sort out crime, sort out immigration,sort out education, sort out the infrastructure for all the above and by all means then worry about my weight. you are a non-elected leader so please vacate. before the UK population get rid of your party. Portly jock.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
